programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E21, In June 1985, a 20-year-old "Sucker Day" Festival Queen is found brutalized. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is on the hands of a local wealthy businessman, but after 25 years DNA reveals the true killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Officer Down
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E06, The longest-running cold case of a law enforcement officer in the United States was the murder of Sheriff's Lt. Joe Clark.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Monster A-Go-Go
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Monster A-Go-Go, S04E21, The search for an astronaut on an alien planet.

programme.title: Future War
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E04, Future War was the most recent film ridiculed by the Satellite of Love crew, proving once and for all that movies aren’t always turned bad by age.

MST3K: Time Chasers, 19971121000000 +0000, A college professor and a reporter go through time in a modified light plane to stop a corporation from using his invention to accidentally create a dystopian future.

programme.title: Time of the Apes
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Time of the Apes, S03E06, Joel and the Bots watch a Japanese rip-off of Planet of the Apes, stage their own version of Inherit the Wind, and Crow shows off the latest in ape fashion.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Radar Men From The Moon - Chapter 1: Moon Rocket
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E01, The first episode of the 1952 serial featuring Commander Cody's trip to the moon.
Backlot: MST3K: Santa Versus Satan, S01E33, This episode of Backlot features an interview with some MST3K crew and other experts as they look back at this quirky Rene Cardona-directed movie.

programme.title: Samson vs. The Vampire Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Samson vs. The Vampire Women, S06E25, While Mike and the Bots wrestle with Santo Versus the Vampire Women, TV's Frank is assumed into Second Banana Heaven, leaving no one for Dr. Forrester to kill.
MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula, 20220506000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.
MST3K: Demon Squad, 20220624000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.
Backlot: MST3K: Santa Versus Satan, S01E33, This episode of Backlot features an interview with some MST3K crew and other experts as they look back at this quirky Rene Cardona-directed movie.

programme.title: The Touch of Satan
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Touch of Satan, S09E08, An aimless young man encounters a rural family that seems to have some secrets.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.
MST3K: Robot Wars, 20220507000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

Broadcasting Christmas, 20161127000000 +0000, Two exes compete for the same co-host position at the nation's favorite morning show in Manhattan. They'll both do what it takes to get ahead, but the fire that burned between them hasn't quite burned out.
Campfire Christmas, 20220716000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Peyton celebrates one last Christmas in July at the summer camp her parents own.
A Nutcracker Christmas, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life she left behind.

The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler, 20090419000000 +0000, The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazi's for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.

The Echo of Thunder, 19980419000000 +0000, A young girl goes to live with her father and stepmother in the Australian outback after her mother's death. Stars Judy Davis and Jamey Sheridan. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Pictures of Hollis Woods, 20071202000000 +0000, Having run away from a succession of foster homes, a 12-year-old girl resorts to desperate measures to stay with the eccentric retired teacher who's made her feel like she's finally in the place where she belongs.

Plainsong, 20040325000000 +0000, Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.

My Gal Sunday, 20140125000000 +0000, A newlywed couple must prove their crime-solving prowess when their politically-tied parents are taken hostage by a vengeful kidnapper looking for justice for the wrongful murder conviction of his brother.

programme.title: Divide And Conquer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E05, When an SGC soldier under the influence of a Goa'uld mind-control device attempts to assassinate a High Council member, SG-1 must uncover other potential assassins, even amongst themselves, before the president arrives for a crucial Summit meeting!

programme.title: Window Of Opportunity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E06, After a visit to a strange planet in the middle of a geomagnetic storm they find themselves repeating the same day over and over again. The team must utilize their accumulated knowledge to stop the time loop before there are disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Watergate
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E07, SG-1 joins forces with a Russian scientist to investigate a rogue Stargate in Siberia, linked to a mysterious water planet. The team must venture via submarine to the water planet, where they encounter an unexpectedly terrifying alien presence.

programme.title: The First Ones
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E08, During an archaeological survey of fossils on a Goa'uld planet, Daniel is abducted by a fearsome creature, prompting SG-1 to embark on a mission to free him. But Daniel soon learns that the creature's intentions are not what he thought!

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E09, After relocating an endangered civilization to a safe new planet, the team realizes that another race of aliens is planning to incinerate the planet's surface to make it inhabitable. Will SG-1 be able to reason with the marauding aliens?

programme.title: Beneath The Surface
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E10, With memories erased and identities changed, SG-1 find themselves trapped below a domed city on a planet of ice, toiling as slave laborers. Can they come to their senses and make a break for the surface, or will they remain enslaved underground?

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E09, McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: First Contact
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E10, Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E11, Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Outsiders
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E12, Col. Sheppard and his team locate Dr. Carson Beckett on an alien planet where he is treating a small group of survivors of the Hoffan plague. But that same evening, a party of Wraith warriors arrives, threatening total annihilation.

programme.title: Inquisition
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E13, A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: The Prodigal
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E14, Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Remnants
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E15, While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Seizure
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E15, Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E16, While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E30, Brandon and Kelly try to help a Bosnian refugee find his wife; Donna puts on a fashion show; Gwyneth takes a page from Valerie's book after admitting feelings for Noah; Steve learns Sarah is married.

programme.title: Budget Cuts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E02, After learning that the clinic may lose funding, Kelly asks Brandon to write a story to generate publicity. David believes that Valerie killed her father in self-defense and should move on.

programme.title: Dealer's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E03, Abby announces that she and Carl are planning to elope in Las Vegas, and asks Val to be her maid of honor. Kelly begs Val to let her tag along on the trip because she believes that Brandon is seeing someone else.

programme.title: Don't Ask, Don't Tell
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E04, Carl decides to annul his marriage to Abby because he believes that he has a future with Valerie. Kelly notices that a store is for lease and decides that she and Donna should open a boutique.

programme.title: Brandon Leaves
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E05, Brandon announces that he has accepted a job with the Washington bureau of the New York Chronicle. Kelly and Donna prepare to open their store, Now Wear This. Valerie seeks legal advice from Matt.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E06, Kelly decides to help Leah and her daughter skip town and assume a new identity. Valerie elects to throw a massive rave as a farewell party before turning herself in to the police.

programme.title: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E07, As Kelly and Valerie pack Brandon's belongings for shipment, Kelly discovers a letter in which Val advised Brandon not to marry her. She turns everyone against Val and gets them to boycott her Thanksgiving gathering.

programme.title: I'm Back Because
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E08, David is arrested for statutory rape and gets suspended from his radio show. Steve bristles at the news that his mother is dating her much younger co-star. Kelly's reaction to Dylan's return worries Matt.

programme.title: The Following Options
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E09, Kelly grows angry with Matt when he takes a case defending a tobacco company. Donna agrees to let a troubled fifteen-year-old girl buy a dress on layaway. Dylan takes his bullet-riddled Porsche out of storage.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E10, Dylan takes Kelly to Mexico for a day and buys her a gift, but Kelly rejects him to focus on her relationship with Matt. Dylan soon takes Gina to Mexico and buys her the same gift.

programme.title: Trials and Tribulations
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E12, Dissatisfied customers take Steve to court, and wind up on TV; Gina continues to care for Dylan, who is arrested; Donna and Noah struggle to find a place to be alone; David has to back up his lie to Gertrude; Kelly second-guesses herself with Matt.

programme.title: Beheading St. Valentine
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E15, Lauren moves into the Walsh house; Steve's idea for his paper leads to an alert about a potential health problem; Donna agrees to pose as David's girlfriend at a business function; Gina worries she can't keep pace with Dylan.

programme.title: Slipping Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E17, Kelly and Dylan agree to go to Mexico and obtain medication for Lauren. Donna agrees to a date with the persistent David. Gina discovers that her mother spent most of the money she earned skating as a minor.

programme.title: Bobbi Dearest
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E18, Gina decides to sue Felice for $1.1 million. Donna, torn apart by her family's bickering, runs crying to Noah. Matt learns that Lauren has filed for divorce. Dylan nearly dies in a Jet Ski accident.

programme.title: The Leprechaun
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E19, Noah faces foreclosure after failing to make his mortgage payments on the Peach Pit/After Dark building. Steve has a man dress up as a leprechaun and promises a "pot of gold" to the person who catches him.

programme.title: Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E20, Dylan's friendly gift to Kelly upsets Gina; Steve is unnerved by a psychic's bitter prediction; David and Claudia lay the groundwork for their faux marriage; a high-school nemesis asks for Donna's help; Matt prepares to advertise on TV.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: Repentent Drunk/5 Yr Old Home Alone
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E373, A drunk driver causes a head-on collision. A 5-year old girl calls 911 when she comes home to an empty house.

programme.title: Runaway Car/Jackson Med Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E379, A woman is unable to stop her car as it reaches speeds over 100-miles per hour. Three girls are treated in the hospital after an accident.

programme.title: Cobra Chaos/Choking Granny
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E164, A Florida man was bitten by his deadly pet Asian Cobra. A grandmother chokes on a homemade roll.

programme.title: Trading Places/Mystery Dispatch
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E334, A 73-year-old Vermont resident is held at knifepoint by an escaped prisoner. Virginia emergency workers receive an unusual call.

programme.title: Mother Shooting/Conrail Train
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E247, A woman is awoken by her husband, who is standing bedside aiming a .22 caliber rifle at her face. Two young children are playing on the railroad tracks oblivious to a freight train bearing down on them.

programme.title: Fire Ant/Spiderman Rescue
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E123, 26-month-old baby falls into a swarm of fire ants/Woman trapped on the ledge of apartment building 20 ft. up.

programme.title: Bathtub Baby/Lightning Lads
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E133, Eight months old is found floating face down in the bathtub / 2 boys both go into cardiac arrest after the tree they take shelter under is struck by lightning.

programme.title: Underage Teen/Cardiac Controller
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E328, A 12-year-old girl is injured when she takes a car for a ride. A Seattle air traffic controller is found unconscious.

programme.title: MOTHER'S DAY FLOOD/ROLLERBLADE
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E323, Two women are trapped by a roaring flash flood. A boy rollerblading is hit by a truck.

programme.title: Pacoima Cliff/American River
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E104, Cliff climber loses footing/gold prospector gets pinned down underwater

programme.title: Talk Show
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E14, Mitch gets his “15 minutes of fame” when he rescues Jay Leno from choking, and a female talk show host from drowning. Caroline and CJ adopt a stray dog swimming in the ocean that mystically reminds them of Stephanie.

programme.title: Life Guardian
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E15, After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E16, Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: Rendezvous
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E17, When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him… except CJ.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E18, While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E19, Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E20, CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Golden Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E21, A crazed young woman is causing trouble on the Venice Boardwalk and Neely suspects it is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Newman meets his dream woman – who doesn’t speak English.

programme.title: Nevermore
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E22, A mysterious, disfigured man whom the public dubs "the phantom lifeguard," is secretly saving people and sending love notes to CJ. When CJ goes missing the team sets out to find her and the “phantom.”

programme.title: Rookie Summer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E01, Young, ambitious and sexy lifeguard candidates compete for a chance to attend Rookie School. Mitch is offered a promotion to Captain and has a tough decision to make. Lani McKensie faces the sinister return of a former lover.

programme.title: Next Generation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E02, Hobie, Lani, April, and Skylar are among the trainees competing for a few open slots as Baywatch Lifeguards. Hobie isn't sure he wants to follow in his father's footsteps, but when a vengeful jet skier comes after April, Hobie comes to her rescue.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E03, Veteran lifeguard Jack 'JD' Darius has a dark secret in his past. He comes to Baywatch to throw his rescue can in the ring for the open Lieutenant slot, but young and ambitious Taylor Walsh also wants the job, and she's ready to fight for it.

programme.title: Memorial Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E04, Mitch, Sky, and April find a dead man on the ocean floor. Their search for answers to his demise leads to the retirement home where he lived, and his two friends who seem to be hiding the true story. The chemistry between Cody and Lani heats up.

programme.title: Charlie
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E05, April is devastated by her younger brother Charlie’s terminal illness. Mitch and Hobie want to make sure Charlie's wishes are granted, and that the time he spends with the lifeguards at Baywatch is the best of his life.

programme.title: Lifeguard Confidential
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E06, Caroline's acting career isn't going well so she returns to Baywatch to figure out what she really wants to do with her life. The lifeguards are plagued by a sleaze-ball helicopter reporter who somehow knows intimate details about their love lives.

programme.title: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E07, After the devastation of the last big L.A. earthquake, Baywatch lifeguards are taking recent Seismic activity seriously. Caroline and JD 's tempestuous relationship heats up, forcing Caroline to make a critical decision that could change her life.

programme.title: El Niño
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E08, The hot Santa Ana winds blow an air of mystery to Baywatch when two sea lions perish in an unexplainable event. Mitch must uncover the cause to stop it from happening again. April is courted by Manny and Hobie, forcing her to choose between them.
